children.name: helloBack
children.text: Hey @npc. Seena sent me. I'm making some inquiries about a clock.
children.response: A clock? Not sure I actually know anything about that. Probably because I'm so busy.

children.name: busy
children.response: Yes. We're getting ready to leave for ComicCon. That's why I'm dressed like this.

children.name: iLikeIt
children.response: Like it? It's terrible. I made a Darth Vader costume, but it's missing. So at the last minute I had to throw together "Toga Man."

children.name: sorry1
children.text: Oh. I'm sorry. Can I help at all?
children.response: Well, if you could find it, I would be forever grateful.

children.name: accept1
children.response: Great. I'd check with Brianna upstairs first. Last I saw, she was getting something to eat.

children.name: whatAreYou
children.text: What character are you supposed to be?
children.response: I'm *supposed* to be Darth Vader. I spent six months making a costume but someone took it. Now I'm dressed up as "Toga Man," whatever that is.

children.name: sorry2
children.text: Oh. I'm sorry. Can help help at all?
children.response: Well, if you could find it, I would be forever grateful.

children.name: accept2
children.response: Great. I'd check with Brianna upstairs first. Last I saw, she was getting something to eat.

entries.name: costumeCompleted
entries.text: Well, thanks for tracking down my Vader costume. I'll work this out with Igor later.

children.name: aboutThatClock
children.text: Glad to help. Now, about that clock? I was told that a Man in Black with piercing white eyes stole it. I haven't been able to track him down.

children.name: jim
children.response: Yeah, Jim. You just described his ComicCon outfit. He stole a clock?

children.name: stoleAClock
children.text: Yeah. Stole a clock. Rang a bell. Ran off. The whole village is buzzing about it.
children.response: I don't know. That doesn't sound like him.

children.name: knowWhere
children.text: So, do you know where he is?
children.response: Yeah, he's been staying in the Guest House, out back.

entries.name: costumeAccepted
entries.text: Have you found my Darth Vader outfit yet? Maybe check with Brianna. She was about to get something to eat upstairs.

children.name: onMyWay
children.text: Okay, I'll head to the dining room.
